metadata.description: Comprehensive plugin marketplace: Personal framework (behavioral rules, engineering principles, 14 specialist agents, 5 MCPs) + ClaudeKit skills (35+ skills) + Enterprise integrations (NetSuite/SDF, Celigo iPaaS, Shopify, Atlassian, Plytix PIM, NinjaOne RMM, M365/Azure AD, Amazon SP-API, Mimecast)

plugins.name: personal-framework
plugins.description: Lean behavioral rules, engineering principles, 14 specialist agents, and MCP server configs (Context7, Sequential, Magic, Serena, Morphllm)

plugins.name: celigo-integration
plugins.description: Celigo iPaaS integration via Python CLI and skills for managing integrations, flows, connections, jobs, and errors

plugins.name: claudekit-skills
plugins.description: Curated collection of 35+ specialized skills: Claude Code mastery, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn-ui, FFmpeg, ImageMagick, better-auth, MCP builder, debugging, document processing, Google ADK, and more

plugins.name: netsuite-skills
plugins.description: NetSuite expertise skills: PRI Container Tracking, SDF deployment, SuiteQL queries, File Cabinet, CRE 2.0, Script Execution Logs, API Toolkit, PRI Query Renderer, and NetSuite debugger

plugins.name: shopify-workflows
plugins.description: Shopify Admin API workflow automation with 5 specialized skills for content creation, merchant operations, marketing campaigns, developer integrations, and analytics

plugins.name: atlassian-skills
plugins.description: Atlassian Confluence and Jira operations via REST API. Includes page creation/update/archive, search, attachments, markdown-to-Confluence conversion with Mermaid diagram support, Jira issue management, JQL queries, and transitions

plugins.name: plytix-skills
plugins.description: Plytix PIM operations via REST API. Includes product management, digital asset handling, category organization, variant creation, and attribute schema management

plugins.name: ninjaone-skills
plugins.description: NinjaOne RMM API integration for device monitoring, management, ticketing, and reporting. Full coverage of 70+ endpoints with OAuth 2.0 authentication

plugins.name: m365-skills
plugins.description: Microsoft 365 and Azure integrations via Microsoft Graph API. Includes Azure AD/Entra ID operations for users, groups, devices, and directory management

plugins.name: amazon-spapi
plugins.description: Amazon Selling Partner API integration via Python CLI. Full coverage for Vendor (1P) and Seller operations including POs, shipments, invoices, orders, catalog, inventory, reports, feeds, pricing, finances, and notifications

plugins.name: mimecast-skills
plugins.description: Mimecast email security integration via Python CLI. 28 operations for TTP URL/attachment protection, held messages, user/group management, policies, audit logs, and SIEM integration

plugins.name: portable-setup
plugins.description: Portable Claude Code configuration system - export, transfer, install, and synchronize your setup across all servers via git

plugins.name: n8n-integration
plugins.description: n8n workflow automation via MCP - 38 tools for workflow management, node discovery, validation, templates, execution monitoring, AI agent patterns, and integration best practices
